languages.text: {n}Маражай поворачивает к вам голову — и Караэль вздрагивает, заметив на его шее клеймо. Голос друкари превращается в шипение.{/n} "Ты... позволил поставить на себе знак, отличный от татуировок Опустошительной бури?" {n}Взгляд Караэля мечется к вам.{/n} "Чей он? Это{mf|го|й} мон-кай?"

{n}Marazhai turns toward you, and Kharael flinches, noticing the brand on his neck. The Drukhari's voice becomes a hiss:{/n} "You... let yourself be branded with a mark other than the tattoos of the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Kharael's gaze swings toward you.{/n} "Who does it belong to? This mon-keigh here?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай поворачивает к вам голову — и Караэль вздрагивает, заметив на его шее клеймо. Голос друкари превращается в шипение.{/n} "Ты... позволил поставить на себе знак, отличный от татуировок Опустошительной бури?" {n}Взгляд Караэля мечется к вам.{/n} "Чей он? Это{mf|го|й} мон-кай?"

traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wendet sich zu dir, und Kharael zuckt zusammen, als er das Brandmal an seinem Hals sieht. Die Stimme des Drukhari verkommt zu einem Zischen:{/n} "Ihr ... habt Euch mit einem anderen Mal als den Tätowierungen des plündernden Sturms markieren lassen?" {n}Kharaels Blick dreht sich zu dir.{/n} "Wem gehört es? Diesem Chem-Pan-Sey hier?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns toward you, and Kharael flinches, noticing the brand on his neck. The Drukhari's voice becomes a hiss:{/n} "You... let yourself be branded with a mark other than the tattoos of the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Kharael's gaze swings toward you.{/n} "Who does it belong to? This mon-keigh here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wendet sich zu dir, und Kharael zuckt zusammen, als er das Brandmal an seinem Hals sieht. Die Stimme des Drukhari verkommt zu einem Zischen:{/n} "Ihr ... habt Euch mit einem anderen Mal als den Tatöwierungen des plündernden Sturms markieren lassen?" {n}Kharaels Blick dreht sich zu dir.{/n} "Wem gehört es? Diesem Chem-Pan-Sey hier?"
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋转向了你。这个时候，卡瑞尔注意到了他脖子上的烙印。他缩了一下，发出了嘶嘶声。{/n}“你……居然烙上了狂风阴谋团纹身之外的印记？”{n}卡瑞尔的目光转向你。{/n}“这是谁的烙印？是这只猴子吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns toward you, and Kharael flinches, noticing the brand on his neck. The Drukhari's voice becomes a hiss:{/n} "You... let yourself be branded with a mark other than the tattoos of the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Kharael's gaze swings toward you.{/n} "Who does it belong to? This mon-keigh here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋转向了你。这个时候，卡瑞尔注意到了他脖子上的烙印。他缩了一下，发出了嘶嘶声。{/n}“你……居然烙上了狂风阴谋团纹身之外的印记？”{n}卡瑞尔的目光转向你。{/n}“这是谁的烙印？是这只猴子吗？”
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Tandis que Marazhai se tourne vers vous, Kharael tressaille en apercevant la marque sur son cou. Il siffle entre ses dents :{/n} « Vous... portez une autre marque que les tatouages de la Tempête ravageuse ? {n}Le regard de Kharael passe de Marazhai à vous.{/n} Qui représente-t-elle ? {mf|Ce|Cette} mon-keigh ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns toward you, and Kharael flinches, noticing the brand on his neck. The Drukhari's voice becomes a hiss:{/n} "You... let yourself be branded with a mark other than the tattoos of the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Kharael's gaze swings toward you.{/n} "Who does it belong to? This mon-keigh here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tandis que Marazhai se tourne vers vous, Kharael tressaille en apercevant la marque sur son cou. Il siffle entre ses dents :{/n} « Vous... portez une autre marque que les tatouages de la Tempête ravageuse ? {n}Le regard de Kharael passe de Marazhai à vous.{/n} « Qui représente-t-elle ? {mf|Ce|Cette} mon-keigh ? »
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se gira hacia ti y Kharael recula al fijarse en la marca de su cuello. La voz del Drukhari pasa a ser un siseo:{/n} «Te... ¿te has dejado marcar con algo más que los tatuajes de la Tempestad Asoladora?». {n}Kharael te mira.{/n} «¿Y a quién pertenece esta marca? ¿A est{mf|e|a} mon-keigh?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns toward you, and Kharael flinches, noticing the brand on his neck. The Drukhari's voice becomes a hiss:{/n} "You... let yourself be branded with a mark other than the tattoos of the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Kharael's gaze swings toward you.{/n} "Who does it belong to? This mon-keigh here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se gira hacia ti y Kharael recula al fijarse en la marca de su cuello. La voz del Drukhari pasa a ser un siseo:{/n} «Te... ¿te has dejado marcar con algo más que los tatuajes de la Tempestad Asoladora?». {n}Kharael te mira.{/n} «¿Y a quién pertenece esta marca? ¿A est{mf|e|a} mon-keigh?».
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}マラズハイがあなたの方を向く。その時、カラエルは彼の首にある烙印に気づいてたじろいだ。デュカーリの声は噛み殺したような音となって漏れる。{/n}「あなたは…その首に、略奪の嵐のタトゥーだけでなく烙印を押されたのか？」{n}カラエルの視線はあなたに移る。{/n}「その印はどこに属するものだ？ここにいるモン＝ケイなのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns toward you, and Kharael flinches, noticing the brand on his neck. The Drukhari's voice becomes a hiss:{/n} "You... let yourself be branded with a mark other than the tattoos of the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Kharael's gaze swings toward you.{/n} "Who does it belong to? This mon-keigh here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイがあなたの方を向く。その時、カラエルは彼の首にある烙印に気づいてたじろいだ。デュカーリの声は噛み殺したような音となって漏れる。{/n}「あなたは…その首に、略奪の嵐のタトゥーだけでなく烙印を押されたのか？」{n}カラエルの視線はあなたに移る。{/n}「その印はどこに属するものだ？ここにいるモン＝ケイなのか？」
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana dönüyor, o sırada boynundaki damgayı gören Kharael ise irkiliyor. Drukhari'nin sesi bir tıslamaya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Sen... Birilerinin seni Müfteris Kasırga dövmeleri haricinde bir sembolle işaretlemesine müsaade mi ettin?" {n}Kharael'in bakışları sana kayıyor.{/n} "Kimin işareti bu? Bu mon-keigh'in mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns toward you, and Kharael flinches, noticing the brand on his neck. The Drukhari's voice becomes a hiss:{/n} "You... let yourself be branded with a mark other than the tattoos of the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Kharael's gaze swings toward you.{/n} "Who does it belong to? This mon-keigh here?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sana dönüyor ve yanağındaki işareti gören Kharael irkiliyor. Drukhari'nin sesi bir tıslamaya dönüşüyor:{/n} "Sen... Birilerinin seni Müfteris Kasırga dövmeleri haricinde bir sembolle işaretlemesine müsaade mi ettin?" {n}Kharael'in bakışları sana kayıyor.{/n} "Kime ait? Bu mon-keigh'e mi?"
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari
